abstract: The Carnegie Corporation says its board has voted to give a $2 million, 29-month grant to the production company of Bill Moyers.
snippet: The Carnegie Corporation says its board has voted to give a $2 million, 29-month grant to the production company of Bill Moyers.
lead_paragraph: 5:04 p.m. | Updated Bill Moyers’ retirement from weekly television last year may not last long. He has received preliminary approval for a major grant to return to PBS with a half-hour show with the working title “Something Different With Bill Moyers.”

headline.main: Bill Moyers Eyes a Possible Return to PBS
